story: You find yourself in a dimly lit room filled with strange machinery and electronic components. At the center of the room is a glowing energy source that seems to be pulsating with an otherworldly power. What do you do?

actions.action: Attempt to harness the energy for personal gain
actions.good: You manage to tap into the energy source, and it begins to resonate with your cybernetic implants. You feel a surge of power and receive a cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt to harness the energy causes a destabilization in the machinery, causing it to malfunction and deal you damage. The energy source remains active, but you're unable to access its power.

actions.action: Try to understand the properties of the energy source
actions.good: You begin to study the energy source, and after some time, you gain a deeper understanding of its properties. You discover that it has the potential to grant you incredible abilities and receive a cache of valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempts to understand the energy source cause it to become unstable, and it begins to emit hazardous radiation. You take damage before being able to escape the room.

actions.good: You decide to destroy the energy source, and it explodes in a blast of energy. The explosion creates a shockwave that deals damage to nearby machinery, but you're able to navigate through the wreckage and find valuable items.
actions.bad: Your attempt to destroy the energy source causes a chain reaction that damages surrounding machinery. You take damage from the blast and are unable to access any loot.
